context_bundle.summary: Package manager guide: System (Winget, Chocolatey, Homebrew, apt), Language (npm, pip, cargo, NuGet). Winget = official Windows PM, pre-installed Win11. Choco = 3rd-party, larger repo. Language PMs for dependencies.

onboarding.quick_start: System PMs: Winget (Win11 default), Chocolatey (3rd-party). Language PMs: npm (JS), pip (Python), cargo (Rust), NuGet (.NET). Install: winget install, choco install. Create packages via manifest YAML.
common_patterns: Create Winget manifest: .yaml with Id, Version, Installer URL
